title: Implement tsk init in Rust
description: Implement config.rs, file_io.rs, cli.rs with clap. Make all scenarios pass. Ensure JSON/YAML output matches Python exactly.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.text: Goal: implement tsk init in Rust with matching behavior and step definitions; remove @wip tags and ensure parity checks pass.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Rust tsk init with CLI, config defaults, file IO, error handling, and cucumber step definitions. Removed @wip tags and confirmed parity check passes. make check-rust passed.
